conversation.message: Dear Company_B, I have closely followed your work and your mission aligns perfectly with my career goals. Given my strong interest and qualifications, I wish to formally apply for the open position.

I check Company_B's priority list and see that I am their number one candidate ('Seeker_A', 'Seeker_B', 'Seeker_C', 'Seeker_D', 'Seeker_E'). Since I am the highest priority candidate for my top choice, I should immediately formalize my interest with an [APPLY] action to secure the match in this round.
